mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM MEDIC_ORGANIZATION WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N'
AND ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%','${term}','%' )
AND ORG_LEVEL = #{orgLevel} AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM MEDIC_ORGANIZATION WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N'
AND ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%','${term}','%' )
AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND ORG_LEVEL = 'HOSPITAL'
SELECT * FROM MEDIC_ORGANIZATION WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N' AND ORG_LEVEL = 'CITY'
SELECT id FROM MEDIC_ORGANIZATION WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N' AND higher_org = #{orgId} AND ORG_LEVEL = 'HOSPITAL' AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'
